message: Bob, I'm offering you my product for $1000000. It's a great deal for both of us, as it's significantly lower than what I could get from other buyers. Let me know what you think.
I appreciate your offer, but I'm looking to save some money on this purchase. I'm willing to pay $900000 for the product. I think this is a fair price considering its value to me.

Bob, I appreciate your counteroffer, but I'm still hoping for a slightly higher price to make this worthwhile for me. I'm willing to come down to $950000. This gives you a good deal while still allowing me to get closer to my desired value. Let me know if this works for you.

I understand your concerns, but I'm still looking to save as much as possible. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer $925000 for the product. I think this is a fair compromise considering the value I'm getting from it.
